text: Ticya ya bolanyavara (hajarata sulemana) yanni smitahasya kele ani du'a (prarthana) karu lagale ki he majhya palanakartya! Tu mala tauphika (subud'dhi) pradana kara ki mi tujhya ya denagyambaddala krtajnata vyakta karavi, jya tu majhyavara kelya aheta ani majhya mata-pityanvara ani mi asi satkarme karita rahave, jyamule tu prasanna rahave ani mala apalya daya- krpene apalya neka- sadacari dasammadhye samila kara
